creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: bead or ornament with tiny image of a person smiling; image appears on both sides of the bead; figure has its hair up in buns on both sides of its head; flowers wrap around each bun; large crown shape on forehead; figure is holding a plaque with a symbol on it; loop attaches to top of figure\'s head
title: Ornament/bead, one of ten
